DOC.brief_summary: Patients with know prostate cancer (PCa) under active surveillance and aged matched controls without evidence of PCa will have a PSA blood test prior to and following standardized digital rectal examination
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of PSA Blood Levels Prior to and After Digital Rectal Examination
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with know prostate cancer (PCa) under active surveillance (Gleason 6, PSA < 10 ng/ml) and aged matched controls without evidence of PCa will have a PSA blood test prior to and following standardized digital rectal examination. The change of PSA will be evaluated.
DOC.criteria: Males Intact Rectum Prostate Cancer eligible for active surveillance Pror radiation therapy Under Androgen Deprivation Therapy Prior prostate surgery
